name: GPT-4.1 nano
description: GPT-4.1 nano is OpenAI's fastest and cheapest model, designed for low-latency tasks. Despite its small size, it delivers strong performance with 80.1% on MMLU and 50.3% on GPQA.
notes: Most cost-effective option with 1 million token context window and 32,000 token output. Optimized for speed and high-volume applications. Supports 75% discount for cached inputs.
